name: three-pathfinding
description: Navigation mesh toolkit for three.js, based on PatrolJS
author: Don McCurdy <dm@donmccurdy.com>

scripts.docs: documentation build src/Pathfinding.js src/PathfindingHelper.js --shallow -f md | replace-between --target README.md --token API

scripts.deploy: npm run dist && npm test && now --static && now alias
